column5: I noticed in several other threads, the trend of groups falling apart due to finances, health etc. After nine straight years of going to Camp Lake St Joseph, I find myself in the same boat. I would never try the trip alone just due to the drive time from home, but would not mind the 4 or 5 days of fishing. So I figure I cant be the only one in this situation. If anyone out there may be looking for a low maintenance guy to fill out a group, preferably from the Iowa, Nebraska or Minnesota area send me a PM. I enjoy walleye and northern fishing, but any fishin is good fishin. Pat N
